data: After a great deal of time examining oceans, investigating rainstorms, and staring very hard at several drinking fountains, the scientists of the world developed a theory regarding how water is distributed around our planet, which they have named “the water cycle.”
oceans | rainstorms | drinking fountains | scientists | world | theory | water | planet | water cycle
The Grim Grotto (A Series of Unfortunate Events, #11)
Lemony Snicket|Lemony Snicket (Goodreads Author), Brett Helquist (Illustrations)
